00002  * Project: BaBar detector at the SLAC PEP-II B-factory
00003  * Package: 
00004  *    File: $Id: BdkPdfBifurGauss.rdl,v 1.1 2005/10/09 22:50:36 abi Exp $

00007  * Description:
00008  *   Class for a BifurGauss pdf with it's own variable definition
00009  *   To be used in conjunction with RooFitCore/Models.
00010  * History:

00014  *                  normalization problem in RooBifurGauss is solved.
00015  *
00016  * Copyright (C) 2002 University of California and SLAC
00017  *****************************************************************************/
